titleStmt.title: SII 13.125: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 125. (A.R. No. 17 of 1931.) TIRUKKŌḌIKĀVAL, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, TIRUKKŌṬĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is stated to be a copy of an old inscription. It records an agreement by the sabhā of Tirukkōḍikā alias Kaṇṇamaṅgalam in Nallāṟṟūr-nāḍu on the northern bank (of the river), to make immune from all taxes, a piece of land sold by them to a resident of the village by name Āttiraiyaṉ Kiḻavaṉ Kōḍikāvaṉ who endowed it to the temple of Mahādēva as meḻukkuppuṟam, i.e., for the maintenance of a servant for cleaning the premises.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Ituvum moru paḻaṅkalpaṭi . kovirājakecaripanmarkku yāṇṭu
5Āvatu vaṭakarai nallāṟṟūrnāṭṭu tirukkoṭikāviṟ mahādevaṟkku Ittirukoṭikāvākiya kaṇṇamaṅkalattu Āttirai
yaṉ kiḻavaṉ koṭikāvaṉ meḻukkupuṟam vaitta nilattukku kiḻpāṟkellai Uṭcciṟuvāykkālukku meṟkkum teṉpāṟkellai pu
tuvāykkālukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai meḻukkuppuṟattukku kiḻa
kkum vaṭapāṟkellai meḻukkuppuṟattu vaṭavellaikkottattukku teṟ
kkum Ivvicaitta perunāṉkellaiyilum Akappaṭṭa nilam kāṇi
Araikkāṇic ceyyum viṟṟukkuṭuttu Epp(o)ṟpaṭṭa Iṟaiyuṅ kāttu
k kuṭuppomāṉom kaṇṇamaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Itu paḻaṅkaṟpa(ṭ)ṭi I
nta śrīvimānattile Eṟa veṭṭiṉamai[yil muṉṉivājakam] veṭṭikkiṭanta taṉikkallāl Ubhaiyoka
m Illāmaiyil Atu t(ā)virttatu paṉmā(y)yeśvararakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.125 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
